data.actual_result: both the member list and server list close at the same time
data.expected_result: only the member list should close as normal
data.short_description: opening both the members list and servers list at the same time then closing out either list causes both lists to close
data.steps_to_repro: - open the member list and server list at the same time using the buttons at the top, provided that your phone supports multi-touch - close out of the member list by swiping it to the right
